text: @DailyCaller Nancy Pelosi is pure evil. Look at her face. How dare her accuse someone of being sinful. She who supports abortion killing of innocent little babies. More deaths than any Coronavirus. The Catholic Church should excommunicate her. I’m afraid her and the pope are one and the same.
